title: Nine Days to Evil
description: CLUE AWARD FINALIST! BLETHER GOLD AWARD!Award-winning Contemporary psychological suspense to celebrate Shakespeare's 400th anniversary. A graduate student, recently married, plunges into studying Shakespeare’s tragedies and abnormal psychology; but a fateful call from her husband propels her into desperation. When a stalker trails her, and her pregnant friend is attacked, she’s afraid to trust anyone. Emboldened by what she learns in class, she resolves to find the truth. Yet she knows one misstep will push her into the clutches of people who want her dead.
author: Nancy G. West
